You must be Have your say... -- http://thewoodknack.blogspot.com/ Well it’s a vintage lathe, replacement tool rests in various sizes would cost more than it’s worth. If this were my ‘forever lathe’ then maybe it would be worth it but someday it’d be nice to upgrade and I don’t want to pour money into this one. #4 posted 08-18-2013 07:07 PM 5376 posts in 1351 days home | projects | blog Rick M. -- Flaws are only in the eye of the artisan!
